abstract: Google is taking steps to make anonymous the logs it keeps of all searches that people conduct.
snippet: Google is taking steps to make anonymous the logs it keeps of all searches that people conduct.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO, March 14 — Web search companies collect records of the searches that people conduct, a fact that has long generated fears among privacy advocates and some Internet users that valuable personal data could be misused.

headline.main: Google Adds a Safeguard on Privacy for Searchers
headline.print_headline: Google Adds A Safeguard On Privacy For Searchers
